description: Incident graph representing infrastructure failures with causal relationships.

nodes.description: Array of incident nodes, each representing an affected component.

evidence.description: Log lines or signals supporting this incident

timestamp.description: ISO timestamp when incident was detected

edges.description: Causal links between nodes. 'from' is the cause (array index), 'to' is the effect (array index).

from.description: Array index of the upstream node (cause)

to.description: Array index of the downstream node (effect)

root.description: Array index of the root cause node. Null if no incident detected.

summary.description: High-level summary of the incident graph or explanation if no incident exists.
